will_review: Thank you! We will carefully review your request and we will send you a reply within one working day.
ticket_incomplete: Warning! Your ticket is imcomplete. Please add all required information and submit again.
allow_to_serve_better: To allow us to serve you better, please try to add as much information as possible about the issue you are encountering. What were you trying to do before the issue occurred? Where did you try this? (In Xumm? An external website?) Is there an error message? Would a screenshot help explain the issue?
please_describe: Please describe your question / issue / suggestion / ... in as much detail as possible.
open_again: For security reasons, XUMM Support xApp sessions are short lived and network bound. Please open the XUMM Support xApp again.
app_or_support_center: Please open XUMM Support with the xApp available in Xumm or submit a support ticket in the {{ support_center }}.
no_read_only: XUMM Support is not available for Read Only accounts.
switch_full_access: Please switch to a full access account by tapping the Switch account button in the upper right corner (at your XUMM account home screen).
no_full_access_mail: If you do not have access to a <q>Full Access</q> account, please mail {{ mailaddr }}
warning_version: Warning! You are running Xumm version {{ current_version }} while version {{ latest_version }} is already available. Please update Xumm to prevent questions about issues already addressed in the updated Xumm version(s).
trouble_finding_ticket: We apologize but we are having trouble displaying your support ticket. If wouldn't mind creating a new ticket we would be happy to assist you. Again, sorry for the inconvenience... üôè.
maintenance: Our support center is currently under maintenance. Please check back later.
with_you_in: We will be with you within one working day
oops_didnt_work: Oops, that didn't work. Please try again.
subject: Onderwerp
tap_to_attach_screenshots: Tap om screenshots toe te voegen
